nodes.text: Perkles were a mammalian species from the Forest Moon of Endor. One day, the young Ewoks Wicket Wystri Warrick, Princess Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka, Teebo and Latara found a perkle trapped in one of Dr. Raygar's traps. While Teebo was stretching to prepare to lift the device, he accidentally pushed Latara in the way of the mouth of the trap. The foreign device activated, sucking the hapless child into the impervious bubble, trapping her with the perkle. Next, Teebo prepared a magic spell with a dust base. Unfortunately, the dust blew into the trap, but it was able to destroy it from the inside, freeing Latara and the perkle.
